nodes.text: Mulatan was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. It served as a guardian world dedicated to the defense of the Bootana Hutta and its throneworlds.

Mulatan was a gateway to the Bootana Hutta, also known as the Garden of the Hutts, which was the location of the throneworlds of the Hutt kajidics. Mulatan was dedicated to the defense of the Bootana Hutta, and was one of the few locations where Hutt warships were commonly found. Outlanders were encouraged not to linger at Mulatan.
The Bootana Hutta was believed by many outsiders to have escaped the devastation of the Yuuzhan Vong War and to be the source of a rumored biotechnology that allowed the Hutts to resist Vongforming.
